topic.title: Workspaces for Retail Client (Retail)
topic.shortdesc: Workspace for Retail Client is a desktop or a mobile UI page that is opened as Retail Clients login to the internet banking application. Retail Clients manage their banking operations within workspace.

body.p: This section contains examples of existing Internet banking application - ÄŒSOB. To make examples relevant to Finshape products, screenshots and videos should be taken from Starter Kit and/or Onboarding application (see Finshape's website).
